english_example_sentence: The small child slept by remaining silently next to his mother.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок уснул, тихо оставаясь рядом со своей матерью.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk, annesinin yanında sessizce kalarak uyudu.
